responsibilities: Innovate by staying at the forefront of AI advancements and exploring new techniques, models, and tools.
Collaborate with core platform and automation engineers, as well as other stakeholders, to identify and address business needs through AI solutions.
Integrate AI-driven features across the platform using APIs, pre-trained models, and other tools.
Optimize and fine-tune existing solutions for specific product requirements, ensuring efficiency, scalability, and reliability.
qualifications: Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, TypeScript, or similar.
Experience in utilizing AI/ML frameworks and tools such as LangChain, LlamaIndex, etc.
Familiarity with cloud infrastructure, ideally AWS, and experience in deploying and scaling AI applications.
Strong understanding of AI/ML concepts with a practical focus on application.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills for conveying complex AI concepts to technical and non-technical audiences.
Strong problem-solving skills and a proactive attitude towards learning and adapting to new challenges.
analysis: The job responsibilities include innovating with AI advancements, integrating AI-driven features, and optimizing AI solutions, which suggest a focus on cutting-edge AI technologies. The skills section mentions experience with AI/ML frameworks and tools such as LangChain and LlamaIndex. LangChain is a framework specifically designed for working with language models, and LlamaIndex is also associated with language model applications. These tools are indicative of working with Generative AI and language models. Additionally, the job requires a strong understanding of AI/ML concepts and the ability to convey complex AI concepts, which aligns with the expertise needed for working with LLMs and GenAI.
